review: Hope to get HBO Go before new season of Game of Thrones starts :)
author: danielle druce

review: Easy to set up.  Plug, log in, update, go.  Obviously you need a good wifi signal for it.  Note that you need a spare AC outlet as well.  Comes with a 3" HDMI adapter (male one side, female other) which is just bendy, I didn't need this but I guess if you have a weird space issue?Replaced the cable box in the bedroom with this..
author: TastyWhale "Tasty Whale!"

review: My music from my amazon library is not loading and not all th apps from amazon tv fire are compatible with the Fire tv stick.

review: Awesome! Easy to install, easy to use. Incredible amount of movies and TV available. Definitely glad I have Amazon prime. I love my fire stick!

review: Use this all the time. Big selection. Just one more bonus to Amazon prime.

review: It's ok, glad I only paid $20. I use my smart blu-Ray more the stick for content. The display mirroring doesn't work very well. I got it to work only once.
